Usage:
```
mvn package
docker build -t alignments .
docker run -p 8080:8080 alignments
```

Align with ID from UniProt DB:
```
curl -X GET -d '{"id1":"P00329", "id2":"P07327", "matrix": "blosum62", "gapOpen": 15.0, "gapExtend": 5.0}' -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Accept: application/json" http://localhost:8080/alignIds
```



Align custom sequences:
```
curl -X GET -d '{"seq1":"", "seq2":"", "matrix": "blosum62", "gapOpen": 15.0, "gapExtend": 5.0}' -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Accept: application/json" http://localhost:8080/align
```
